author: Football Italia staff
title: Liverani: 'Serie A must be free of the virus before we return'
description: Lecce coach Fabio Liverani wants all the teams to go through tests in an event of a return in Serie A. âThe positive tests also increase in footballâ.
content:
Lecce coach Fabio Liverani wants all the teams to go through tests in an event of a return in Serie A. “The positive tests also increase in football”.
The Giallorossi were 18th in Serie A, only behind Genoa on goal difference, when the season was suspended, … [+1285 chars]
